title: 84/299/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 May 1984 on the approval of the special programme for the Tuscany region concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 May 1984
on the approval of the special programme for the Tuscany region concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(84/299/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The specific programme forwarded by the Italian Government on 1 December 1983, as amplified by information supplied on 24 February 1984, for the Tuscany region concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat, pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 May 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 197, 20. 7. 1981, p. 27.
